subsection_content:
Complications of obesity include:
Metabolic syndrome.; Diabetes.; Cardiovascular disorders.; Liver disorders such as non-alcoholic steatohepatitis can lead to cirrhosis.; Gallbladder disease (gallstones).; Gastroesophageal reflux.; Obstructive sleep apnea.; Reproductive system disorders, including infertility in both sexes and low serum testosterone levels in men; Obesity is a risk factor for polycystic ovary syndrome in women.; Many cancers (especially colon cancer and breast cancer).; Osteoarthritis.; Tendon and fascia disorders; Skin disorders.; Economic, social and psychological issues; Depression, anxiety, low self-esteem, poor body image, stigma and discrimination.
subsection_title: beo phi.json. Complications of people with obesity
